Design‑Led Luxury.

Boutique Excellence.

Ellington is Dubai’s celebrated design‑first boutique developer recognized for architectural innovation, premium craftsmanship, and modern aesthetics that deliver strong ROI and capital appreciation.

~ Property Sales in 2024
💰 6 B
JV with Dutco (financial backing)
🤝 1.2 B
Ongoing & new projects
📊 45 +
Project delays/defaults reported
🗓️ 0 notable

Why

Ellington?

A fastest‑growing, design‑led real estate brand, delivering consistent ROI and appreciation through architecture, build quality, and prime locations.

Design‑First DNA
Modern architecture and boutique craftsmanship drive investor trust and end‑user appeal.
Financial Stability
Strong backing despite private status — e.g., AED 1.2B JV with Dutco; reliable delivery track‑record.
Performance Outliers
Projects often outperform neighboring communities on resale value and rental yields.
Strategic Footprint
High‑potential nodes across Dubai Hills, Palm Jumeirah, MBR City, JLT, JVC, and more.
Investor Confidence
Consistent ROI and capital appreciation underpin brand traction and global recognition.
Boutique Excellence
Smarter planning and finishes translate into long‑term value preservation.

Design‑First DNA
Modern architecture and boutique craftsmanship drive investor trust and end‑user appeal.
Financial Stability
Strong backing despite private status — e.g., AED 1.2B JV with Dutco; reliable delivery track‑record.
Performance Outliers
Projects often outperform neighboring communities on resale value and rental yields.
Strategic Footprint
High‑potential nodes across Dubai Hills, Palm Jumeirah, MBR City, JLT, JVC, and more.
Investor Confidence
Consistent ROI and capital appreciation underpin brand traction and global recognition.
Boutique Excellence
Smarter planning and finishes translate into long‑term value preservation.

Strategic Locations

45+ Projects

A growing portfolio concentrated in high‑potential districts to maximize capital growth and rental performance.

○ Dubai Hills — green master community adjacency

○ Palm Jumeirah — ultra‑prime waterfront positioning

○ MBR City — central, fast‑appreciating corridor

○ JLT & JVC — strong rental markets with steady resale liquidity

○ Additional nodes across Dubai’s emerging hotspots

Consistent ROI & Appreciation

Recognized for superior capital growth and yields versus neighboring developments.

Design & Build Standards

Aesthetic innovation and quality control support long‑term value retention.

Delivery Reliability

Stable execution with no notable delays or defaults reported, reinforcing confidence.

Key

Notes

2024 Sales Performance

Achieved approximately AED 6 billion in property sales in 2024.

Financial Backing

Despite being private, Ellington shows strong support (e.g., AED 1.2B JV with Dutco) and no notable project delays/defaults.

Awards

Projects like DT1 have won “Best Luxury Project” and “Best Residential High‑Rise Architecture.”

Investment Performance

Consistent ROI and appreciation; developments typically outperform neighboring communities on resale and rental yields.

Off‑Plan Footprint

Strong pipeline across Dubai Hills, Palm Jumeirah, MBR City, JLT, JVC, and more — totaling 45+ projects.
